StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: DELETEDEPARTMENT
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.DELETEDEPARTMENT(pFaculty IN VARCHAR2, pName IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN&lt;br/&gt; DELETE&lt;br/&gt; TABLE(SELECT faculty_table.department_List&lt;br/&gt; FROM faculty_table&lt;br/&gt; WHERE faculty_table.name = pFaculty)&lt;br/&gt; WHERE name = pName;&lt;br/&gt; COMMIT;&lt;br/&gt;END deleteDepartment;
